platforms.name: Synthesia 2.0
platforms.description: The latest generation of Synthesia's AI video platform, featuring hyper-realistic AI avatars with full emotional range, real-time voice cloning, and a new 'Director AI' that can script and produce entire videos from a document.

platforms.name: Kaleido
platforms.description: Kaleido is an enterprise-grade video understanding AI platform that automatically analyzes, indexes, and extracts insights from video content at scale. It processes visual, audio, and text elements simultaneously to enable powerful search, summarization, content moderation, and compliance workflows. Its unique selling point is its multimodal, frame-accurate analysis engine designed specifically for large-volume enterprise video libraries.
keyFeatures: Frame-accurate object, scene, and activity detection with timestamped metadata
Audio transcription with automatic speaker diarization (identifies who said what)
Sentiment and emotion analysis derived from both visual cues and audio tone

platforms.name: Tavus 2.0
platforms.description: Tavus 2.0 is an enterprise-grade AI video personalization platform that creates ultra-realistic, one-to-one videos by cloning a person's voice, face, and mannerisms. It enables businesses to automate personalized communication at scale for marketing, sales, and customer success. Its unique value lies in its proprietary 'Programmatic Video' technology, which dynamically inserts viewer-specific variables into a single master recording, producing videos that feel genuinely bespoke without the need for repeated filming.
keyFeatures: High-fidelity voice and visual replica creation from a short sample video
Dynamic variable insertion for names, companies, custom details, and even unique URLs/images
Programmatic Video API for generating and distributing videos within existing workflows
